content.text: Match ends, Arsenal 1, Atlético de Madrid 1.
Second Half ends, Arsenal 1, Atlético de Madrid 1.
Attempt missed. Granit Xhaka (Arsenal) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right following a corner.
Corner,  Arsenal. Conceded by Stefan Savic.
Attempt saved. Aaron Ramsey (Arsenal) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Mesut Özil with a cross.
Corner,  Arsenal. Conceded by Lucas Hernández.
